Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Rockwell
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, California, Cermak, Western and 26th due to, street blockage near 26th/Rockwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via26th, California, Cermak, Western and 26th due to, street blockage near 26th/Rockwell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 36th/Kedzie
ShortDescription: WB 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, California, I-55 and Kedzie due to, street blockage near 36th/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, California, I-55 and Kedzie due to, street blockage near 36th/Kedzie.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Northbound Reroute near 36th/Kedzie
ShortDescription: NB 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Pershing, California, I-55 and Kedzie due to, street blockage near 36th/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
